page.title: 04HOPE FARM
page.content: Rebecca and Donna went to see Mr.Watts who owns Hope Farm on the edge of Buckhorn Weston village. He was extremely helpful and gave all the following information:- Size of farm 200 acres Number of cattle 115 milking cows Breed of cattle Friesian mostly Farm History:- There has been a farm on this site for 400 years. Mr Watts has lived there for 23 years. There used to be several cottages and another farmhouse on the land but these have now been demolished and quite a lot of modernisation has taken place. He runs two Ford tractors and one Leyland and makes silage from his own grass to provide food for the cattle, in the Winter. Mr Watts attends Sturminster Newton market, usually each week to buy and sell heifers.
